parameters.name: tagColor
parameters.shortdesc: The dolor of the tag, specified either as an array of three doubles, each in the range 0 to 255 and representing R, G, and B values, or as a UI color. Can accept: Array of 3 Reals (0 - 255) or UIColors enumerator.

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new XMLTag

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the XMLTag.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the XMLTag with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the XMLTag with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the XMLTag with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the XMLTags within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The XMLTag, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: XMLTag, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The XMLTag, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: XMLTag, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first XMLTag in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last XMLTag in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle XMLTag in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the XMLTag with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the XMLTag that follows the desired XMLTag.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the XMLTag whose index follows the specified XMLTag in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The XMLTag whose index comes before the desired XMLTag.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any XMLTag in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every XMLTag in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the XMLTag.
Returns the XMLTag with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
